org.xbib.elasticsearch.index.analysis.skos
Class SKOSAnalyzer

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer
      org.apache.lucene.analysis.util.StopwordAnalyzerBase
          org.xbib.elasticsearch.index.analysis.skos.SKOSAnalyzer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable
public class SKOSAnalyzer
extends org.apache.lucene.analysis.util.StopwordAnalyzerBase

An analyzer for expanding fields that contain either (i) URI references to SKOS concepts OR (ii) SKOS concept prefLabels as values.

setMaxTokenLength

public void setMaxTokenLength(int length)
Set maximum allowed token length. If a token is seen that exceeds this length then it is discarded. This setting only takes effect the next time tokenStream or tokenStream is called.

getMaxTokenLength
